newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Desert Sans USD, Calif..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Desert Sans USD, Calif..

text.p: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that sealed or facsimile bids will be received by Sutro & Co. Incorporated, the Financial Advisor, acting on behalf of the Desert Sands Unified School District, County of Riverside, State of California (the District''), for the purchase of $10,000,000* principal amount of Desert Sands Unified School District, County of Riverside, California 1997 Tax and Revenue Anticipation Notes at the hour of 10:00 A.M., Pacific Daylight Time, on

at the office of Sutro & Co. Incorporated, 555 South Flower Street, Suite 4630, Los Angeles, California 90071, facsimile no. (213) 624-5263. In the event that no bid is awarded, the County and the District will receive bids the next business day and each business day thereafter at the same time and location until such time as a bid is awarded or the County and the District determine to withdraw sale of the Notes. An Official Statement and an Official Notice of Sale relating to the Notes will be furnished upon request to the Financial Advisor at (213) 362-4138.
